content.value:
I weighed myself and am the heaviest I've *ever* been, and then I spent 15 minutes admiring my body in the mirror. It should be illegal to be this hot. Like. Damn.

Tl;dr certain parts of me are hotter at higher weights. Attractiveness is very flexible. You're all hot goodbye
